headline: Rising Phoenix Capital Announces Strategic Eagle Ford Acquisition and Final Placement for Maroon Bells Income Fund
summary: DALLAS, October 29, 2025--Rising Phoenix Capital, a Dallas-based investment firm specializing in oil and gas mineral royalties, today announced the acquisition of 249.05 net royalty acres (NRA) in the core of the Eagle Ford Shale, operated by EOG Resources Inc. and Lewis Energy Group. The acquisition marks the final placement for Maroon Bells LP, part of Rising Phoenix’s broader Income Strategy platform focused on acquiring producing mineral assets that generate steady, yield-driven returns. Wit
